Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities Job role:For Non-voice accounts payable/ Accounts Receivables Process in general.Candidates will be working on Billing, Procure to Pay, R2R process, O2C and other accountingprocesses.Involved in Processing the invoices and other processes like verification, making payments, timely follow-ups, validations, reconciliations, Vendor Inquiry, etc.Expectations:Looking for candidates with good communication skills.B.Com, MBA finance, M.Com freshers with good knowledge on basic accounting.Flexible with US/ Night shift and rotational shift - One side cab is provided.We are looking for immediate joiners only.CTC: 2.25 LPA.
